title: Bonus 36 The Twelve Minor Prophets IV: Micah and Nahum
itunes:title: Bonus: The Twelve Minor Prophets IV: Micah and Nahum
description: I'm joined by Steve Guerra as we continue our series on the twelve minor Old Testament prophets. Here we tackle Micah and Nahum. Micah is the chirpiest of the prophets, a favorite amongst both Christians and Jews. No one loves the frothing ravings of Nahum.
content:encoded: I'm joined by Steve Guerra as we continue our series on the twelve minor Old Testament prophets. Here we tackle Micah and Nahum. Micah is the chirpiest of the prophets, a favorite amongst both Christians and Jews. No one loves the frothing ravings of Nahum.
itunes:subtitle: Bonus: The Twelve Minor Prophets IV: Micah and Nahum
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Steve Guerra
